co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.entity

Class EntityBoss

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.entity.Entity
      • net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase
        • net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving
          • net.minecraft.entity.EntityCreature
            • net.minecraft.entity.monster.EntityMob
              • co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.entity.EntityBoss
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.entity.boss.IBossDisplayData, net.minecraft.entity.monster.IMob, net.minecraft.entity.passive.IAnimals

    public class EntityBoss
extends net.minecraft.entity.monster.EntityMob
implements net.minecraft.entity.boss.IBossDisplayData
    Base for boss mobs, giving a projectile method for convenience. Due to inheritance, all that extend this will not need to implement IBossDisplayData.
    Author:
    Niadel

    • Field Detail

      • projectileEntity

        public net.minecraft.entity.Entity projectileEntity
        The entity that is being launched. Can be anything. By default, it is an arrow.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • attackEnemyFromRange

        public void attackEnemyFromRange(net.minecraft.entity.Entity target,
                        double xOffset,
                        double yOffset,
                        double zOffset)
        A utility method that attacks a mob with a projectile. Is customisable, just pass a target and the offset from the entity. Don't use too much as it does use reflection.

      • attackEntityFromRange

        public void attackEntityFromRange(net.minecraft.entity.Entity target,
                         net.minecraft.entity.Entity projectile,

                         double zOffset)

        Parameters:
        target -
        projectile -
        xOffset -
        yOffset -
        zOffset -

      • setProjectile

        public void setProjectile(net.minecraft.entity.Entity theProjectile)
        Sets the projectile the entity should use in the first attackEntityFromRange.
